items.title: Irish vs USC for the Jeweled Shillelagh — that means it’s TROJAN BLOOD WEEK
items.summary: It’s that time again for Notre Dame Football fans all over the country (the world, really). It’s time to break out the Trojan Blood to sanctify the greatest intersectional rivalry in college football — Notre Dame VS Southern Cal. USC is having a fairly good season up to this point, and they are developing hopes and dreams […]

items.title: 2025 Notre Dame Football Schedule, TV Times, Stat Leaders, Roster, and Results
items.summary: The Notre Dame football season is up and running — and we’re already putting holes in walls. Despite the loss in Miami, and against Texas A&M, the Irish still have a chance to bring home its 23rd national championship. The gang here at OFD is still pretty pumped to give you the best overall coverage […]

items.title: Opening Odds: Notre Dame is a home favorite over the USC Trojans
items.summary: We’re getting a RANKED Jeweled Shillelagh game between the #13 ranked Notre Dame Fighting Irish and the #20 ranked USC Trojans (which should yellow up Bud Elliott’s Cheerios). Notre Dame has torn up its competition siince starting the season 0-2 and legitimately looks like a real contender for (and in) the college football playoff. Southern […]

items.title: How Notre Dame’s opponents fared in week 7 of the college football season
items.summary: Notre Dame got off to a rough start in 2025, but they looked like they fixed a few things in a 56-30 win over the Purdue Boilermakers and then the 56-13 win on the road against the Arkansas Razorbacks. They followed those two victories with two victories which covered massive spreads in a 28-7 win […]

items.title: Notre Dame Football Stats: 2025-26 Week 7 Review after Win over NC State
items.summary: Notre Dame football is now on a four-game winning streak with it’s 36-7 win over the NC State Wolfpack in Week 7.  The team is gaining steam as we head into the 2025-26 season’s back stretch and it was a pretty solid outing from the Irish, from the numbers’ angle. Let’s see what we can […]
